title: Requires that aid and incentives to the city of Rochester are paid on or before June thirtieth in the fiscal year such aid is due and payable
summary: Requires that aid and incentives to the city of Rochester are paid on or before June thirtieth in the fiscal year such aid is due and payable.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3116

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. GANTT, MORELLE -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Ways and Means

       AN ACT in relation to paying aid and incentives to the city of Rochester
         on or before June thirtieth in the fiscal year such aid is provided

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Notwithstanding  any  other  law to the contrary, for the
    2  state fiscal year beginning April 1, 2012, and in each state fiscal year
    3  thereafter, ten million dollars of aid and incentives for municipalities
    4  otherwise due and payable to the city of Rochester on  or  before  March
    5  thirty-first  shall  be  paid on or before June thirtieth in such fiscal
    6  year upon written request by the chief elected official of such city  to
    7  the  director of the budget, provided such request is made no later than
    8  April 1, 2012.
    9    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03382-01-1
actClause: AN ACT in relation to paying aid and incentives to the city of Rochester on or before June thirtieth in the fiscal year such aid is provided
